page.title: 18CHARITY EVENT
page.content: Every year thousands of people of all ages walk through the lanes and across the fields in this area. It is the Christian Aid Walk which is a 50km. sponsored walk and although different routes are always followed, some part of the area is covered. This year's walk went through the gravel pits to Thundridge, back to Wadesmill, up to Sacombe Park and out to Stonyhills and then on. Where possible the local people act as stewards but the walk is organised centrally by the Hertford Council of Churches. Wherever there is a change of direction a steward is positioned to make sure no-one is lost. The charity Christian Aid is an organisation which gives help to needy communities and individuals in any country regardless of race,colour, politics or religion.
